info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 16 at 5:40AM AST until September 16 at 5:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices of 108 degrees or more. * WHERE...Northwest, San Juan and Vicinity, and St. Croix. * WHEN...From 10 AM AST until 5 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is likely with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
